0.2.8.name: wordpress/yakadanda-team
0.2.8.description: This Plugin creates a Custom Post Type called Team with it's custom taxonomy 'team-category'. All WordPress functions to get team data should work such as WP_Query or query_posts with post_type 'team'. Team Custom Settings also saved as hidden custom field. Office List is saved to wp_options table with key name as 'yteam_office_list'.
